titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on Cyanuric chloride.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/15/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on Cyanuric chloride.
